cards.name: Nerve Agent
cards.text:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Nerve Agent.
Each virus counter after the first on Nerve Agent allows you to access 1 additional card from HQ whenever you access cards from HQ.

cards.name: Joshua B.
cards.text: When your turn begins, you may gain [Click]. If you do, take 1 tag when this turn ends.
cards.flavor: "My enhancements are guaranteed for life, and well worth the risk."

cards.name: Emergency Shutdown
cards.text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez a piece of ice.
cards.flavor: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda

cards.name: Muresh Bodysuit
cards.text: Prevent the first meat damage each turn.
cards.flavor: Light and form-fitting, it's like bulletproof skin.

cards.name: Snitch
cards.text: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.
cards.flavor: "A snitch is a girl's best friend." -Andromeda

cards.name: Chaos Theory: Wunderkind
cards.text: +1[Memory Unit]

cards.name: Test Run
cards.text: Search your stack or heap for a program. Install that program, ignoring all costs. Shuffle your stack if you searched it. When this turn ends, add the program to the top of your stack if it is still installed.

cards.name: Dinosaurus
cards.text: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +1 strength. Limit 1 console per player.

cards.name: Personal Workshop
cards.text: [Click]: Host a program or a piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost. 1[Credit]: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When there are no power counters levton a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.

cards.name: Public Sympathy
cards.text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
cards.flavor: "I'm just thankful that brain damage is reversible. With the support of the city of New Angeles, I hope to be on my feet and back to practicing my art very soon." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

cards.name: Project Vitruvius
cards.text: When you score Project Vitruvius, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token over 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

cards.name: Viper
cards.text: [Subroutine] Trace3- If successful, the Runner loses [Click], if able. [Subroutine] Trace3- If successful, end the run.

cards.name: Edge of World
cards.text: If Edge of World is installed and you pay 3[Credits] when the Runner accesses it, do 1 brain damage for each piece of ice protecting this server.

cards.name: Sunset
cards.text: Choose a server. Arrange the ice protecting that server in any order.
cards.flavor: "You haven't run until you've seen the cybersun drift down behind the Great City, the space around you rippling with colors you can't imagine." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey

cards.name: Marked Accounts
cards.text: When your turn begins, take 1[Credit] from Marked Accounts, if able. [Click]: Place 3[Credits] from the bank on Marked Accounts.

cards.name: Pop-up Window
cards.text:
When the Runner encounters Pop-up Window, you gain 1[Credit].
[Subroutine] End the run unless the runner pays 1[Credit].
cards.flavor: "Try to close it. Go on. See what it does." -Chaos Theory

cards.name: Woodcutter
cards.text: Woodcutter can be advanced only when rezzed and gains "[Subroutine]" Do 1 net damage." for each advancement token on it.

cards.name: Commercialization
cards.text: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1[Credit] for each advancement token on that ice.
cards.flavor: The Division of Fringe Applications' revenue increased 37% year-over-year after corporate discovered that most of their projects made really fun toys.

cards.name: Private Contracts
cards.text: Place 14[Credits] from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it. [Click]: Take 2[Credits] from Private Contracts.

cards.name: Chimera
cards.text: When you rez Chimera, choose sentry, code gate, or barrier. Chimera gains that subtype until derezzed. When a turn ends, derez Chimera. [Subroutine] End the run.
